summary: This is an FBI 302 form documenting an interview with a female witness (referred to as [REDACTED]) conducted on September 19, 2019. The witness provides detailed allegations of sexual abuse by Jeffrey Epstein, facilitated by Ghislaine Maxwell, including encounters before and after she turned 18. The document describes Maxwell's role in recruiting, grooming, and managing the witness for Epstein's sexual gratification.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described as recruiting, grooming, and managing the witness for Jeffrey Epstein's sexual abuse. She facilitated meetings, gave instructions, and discussed Epstein's sexual needs with the witness.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The primary perpetrator of sexual abuse described by the witness. The document details multiple sexual encounters, including forced intercourse, and his interactions with the witness.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Mentioned as being present at Epstein's West Palm Beach property at some point, where he wanted to sunbathe topless.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who would book travel and call the witness to connect her with Epstein. She flew separately with Maxwell and the witness.

persons.name: Donald Trump
persons.context: Mentioned as being met by the witness at a party while she was with Ghislaine Maxwell. Maxwell introduced the witness to him.

connections.description: Maxwell recruited, groomed, and managed girls for Epstein's sexual abuse. She discussed his sexual needs and facilitated encounters.
Maxwell recruited the witness when she was about 17, facilitated her sexual abuse by Epstein, and paid her for massages that turned sexual.
Epstein sexually abused the witness on multiple occasions, including before she turned 18. He paid her, gave her gifts, and made threatening statements.
They traveled together and Groff assisted in communications, calling the witness to connect her with Epstein.
Maxwell introduced the witness to Trump at a party, indicating a social acquaintance.

events.title: FBI Interview of Witness
events.description: A witness is interviewed by the FBI, providing detailed allegations of sexual abuse by Jeffrey Epstein facilitated by Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: First Sexual Encounter with Epstein
events.description: The witness's first massage for Epstein turned sexual when he had an erection and placed her hand on his penis. Maxwell was outside the room and asked about it afterward.

events.title: West Palm Beach School Girl Incident
events.description: During a visit to West Palm Beach after turning 18, the witness found a school girl outfit on her bed placed by Maxwell. She was pressured to wear it and bring Epstein tea, after which Epstein sexually assaulted her.

events.title: Visit to Epstein's Island
events.description: When the witness was 22, she traveled to Epstein's island. Epstein became mean, threw money at her, and Maxwell demanded reports on sexual acts performed.

events.title: Meeting with Donald Trump
events.description: The witness met Donald Trump at a party while with Ghislaine Maxwell, who introduced her.

keyFacts: The witness alleges that two of her sexual encounters with Jeffrey Epstein occurred before she turned 18 years old.
Ghislaine Maxwell played a central role in recruiting the witness at age ~17, facilitating the abuse, paying her, and demanding reports on sexual acts performed for Epstein.
Epstein told the witness he knew how to kill people, which she felt made it hard to say no to him.
Maxwell and Epstein discussed having children, with Epstein asking the witness if she would have a baby with him and Maxwell commenting she was 'getting too old'.
The witness received a threatening phone call from an unknown male while assisting an attorney, and Maxwell called her approximately three years prior to the 2019 interview.
